name: Korona Z
description:
Description

Korona Z is a 2D horror action game. In an alternate world where the Korona Virus has evolved to take over human brains and turn them into mindless zombies. You must make your way through different levels and kill zombies that are blocking your path to survive this undead world.

Controls

  • [LMB] = Shoot
  • [W] = Move Up; [A] = Move Left; [S] = Move Down; [D] = Move Right

Credits

  • Aldo Gunaidi (Project Manager)
  • Eduardo Brilliandy (Game Designer)
  • David Kennedy (Game Designer)
  • Valenstio (Programmer)
  • Gaung Ramadhan Baswara (Programmer)
  • Reynard Austin (2D Artist)
  • Leon (Sound Engineer)
  • Dimas Rizky Hutama (Project Supervisor)
